name: VPN Proxy Master
summary: Free VPN with affiliate ad injection system that hijacks user link clicks across all websites. When clicked links match server-side advertising domain list, extension intercepts and redirects through affiliate links via trendcampaign.com. Spoofs Origin header to impersonate a different extension. VPN bypass for own infrastructure exposes user's real IP.

vulnerabilities.title: Affiliate Link Hijacking via Content Script
vulnerabilities.description: Content script ads.js runs on all pages, intercepts link clicks matching server-side ad domain list, queries trendcampaign.com, and redirects through affiliate URLs.

vulnerabilities.title: Origin Header Spoofing
vulnerabilities.description: Spoofs Origin header via declarativeNetRequest to impersonate extension pphgdbgldlmicfdkhondlafkiomnelnk when making API requests.

flags.description: Hijacks user link clicks matching server-side ad domain list and redirects through affiliate links
Content script injects affiliate redirect interception on all websites
